Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to imposing an excise tax on sugary drinks
Summary: Imposes an excise tax on sugary drinks and establishes a children's health promotion fund to utilize the revenues generated by such tax.
LawCode: Add Art 17 §§400 - 407, Tax L; add §99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law and the state finance law, in relation to imposing an excise tax on sugary drinks
